means: （使用）南非荷兰语的，南非白人的

sentence.Network_en: Afrikaans, Dutch, English, Flemish, and German are the more important languages within the West germanic grouping.
sentence.Network_cn: 南非荷兰语 、 荷兰语 、 英语 、 佛兰芝语及德语则属西日耳曼语的几种重要语言.

sentence.Network_en: Their name comes from South Africa's Afrikaans language and means " earth pig. "
sentence.Network_cn: 他们的名字源于南非的荷兰语意思是 “ 泥猪 ”.

sentence.Network_en: Yiddish and Luxem - bourgian are offshoots of German, and Afrikaans is based on Dutch.
sentence.Network_cn: 依地语和卢森堡语是德语的分支.南非荷南语源于荷兰语.

PerfectNetExp.abs: afridis 阿夫里迪人, afrikaans 南非白人的, afriend 朋友

list.abs: Bahasa Chinese, 翻译,... ... Common Language Runtime; 公共语言运行时 bahasa afrikaans 南非语 bahasa Afrikaans 南非荷兰语.

entry.tran: 南非荷兰语（南非的官方语言之一）
entry.def: Afrikaans is one of the official languages of South Africa.

example.tran: 一份激进的南非荷兰语报纸

means.word_mean: 1. an official language of the Republic of South Africa; closely related to Dutch and Flemish
1. belonging or relating to white people of South Africa whose ancestors were Dutch or to their language;

auth_sentence.content: Re-defining the role of Afrikaans is not just something that white Afrikaners feel strongly about.
auth_sentence.res_content: Re-defining the role of Afrikaans is not just something that white Afrikaners feel strongly about.
